pr_title: [BEAM-7705] Update BigQuery docs with new code snippets

timeline.message: [BEAM-7705] Update BigQuery docs with new code snippets

timeline.bodyText: Did you intend to use underscore separated text (not camel case) for Java ?
timeline.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: We usually do region tags in snake_case for all languages regardless of the language style. The reason is that by keeping them consistent through all languages, it's easier to build tools to parse them and compare between which snippets exist for each language.
replies.author: davidcavazos
